Selecting Elements

// By class

// By selector

let button = document.getElementById('myBtn');
button.textContent = "Click me!";
button.style.color = "blue";

Click Events

let btn = document.getElementById('myBtn');
btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
  console.log("Button clicked!");
});
